instructions: # OVA Character Sheet## Dice RollingEnter the number of dice to roll in the

field and press the roll button (the roll button is also a token action so is always available when the token is selected). The results will be put in a roll template for easy reading. To make things as easy as possible, If you could attach the field numdicetoroll to one of the bubbles on the token; this will allow you to roll dice without having to open the character sheet every time.
